name: XRP
description: XRP is a digital asset and native currency of the XRP Ledger, a decentralized, open-source blockchain designed for fast, low-cost, and secure global payments and currency exchanges. While the Ripple company uses XRP for its payment solutions, it does not own the cryptocurrency. XRP functions as a bridge currency to facilitate transactions between different currencies and features a quorum-based consensus protocol for rapid transaction confirmations.
